title: Who knew fortnite was the prophesized cod killer?
body:
Who knew fortnite would be the prophesized cod killer weve been waiting for a long time.

cod is in ashes now cause of fortnite after all these false prohecies of destiny being it, titanfall, etc.

Just feels good to be alive to see the game of prophecy that took down cod is here and I was here to see it for myself
